name: Carrot Cake Overnight Oats Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need:  quaker rolled oat, fresh pasteurized milk, natural yogurt, honey, carrot, walnuts, cinnamon
recipeInstructionSteps: Add all of the ingredients except for the carrot and walnut in a clean mason jar.
Add the leftover walnuts and carrots.
Put a lid on the mason jar and refrigerate overnight 40°F (≤ 5°C).
